subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Testimony last week in a lawsuit brought by Ed O’Bannon, a former U.C.L.A. star, gave a hint of how lucrative college sports are to nearly everyone but the players.
snippet: Testimony last week in a lawsuit brought by Ed O’Bannon, a former U.C.L.A. star, gave a hint of how lucrative college sports are to nearly everyone but the players.
